title: Wrapping cloth (pojaggi)
description: A multi-color patchwork of silk squares, rectangles and triangles in blues, greens, yellows, oranges, pinks and white. The design gives the appearance of radiating out from the center, with the smallest pieces in the center and multiple framing squares. Off-white lining.
name: Wrapping cloth (pojaggi)
